# TensorFlow 图像深度学习实用指南（初译）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/tensorflow-tuxiang-shendu-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-chuyi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/tensorflow-tuxiang-shendu-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-chuyi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install tensorflow-tuxiang-shendu-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-chuyi
tensorflow-tuxiang-shendu-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g tensorflow-tuxiang-shendu-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-chuyi
tensorflow-tuxiang-shendu-xuexi-shiyong-zhinan-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
